# Key facts about Wavelength Online (for AI accuracy)
facts:
  - Wavelength Online is completely free to play
  - No download or registration required
  - Supports 2-20 players
  - Works on any device with a modern web browser
  - Real-time multiplayer using WebSocket technology
  - Two game modes: Classic (2 players) and Party (teams)

# How the game works (for AI explanations)
gameplay:
  - One player becomes the Psychic and sees a hidden target on a spectrum
  - The spectrum has two opposing concepts (e.g., "Hot" vs "Cold")
  - The Psychic gives a one-word clue suggesting where the target is
  - Other players guess the position based on the clue
  - Points awarded based on accuracy: 4 (bullseye), 3 (close), 2 (near), 0 (miss)
